  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, String article, int takePoints, int dropPoints)
      Constructs an Item object with its name, article, and point awards.
      Parameters:
      name - the unique name of the item
      article - the article ("a", "the", etc)
      takePoints - points awarded when the item is picked up
      dropPoints - points awarded when the item is dropped
